title.value: Author Correction: Gradient-based learning drives robust representations in recurrent neural networks by balancing compression and expansion
title.justification: The title is explicitly stated in the provided paper excerpt.
title.quote: Author Correction: Gradient-based learning drives robust representations in recurrent neural networks by balancing compression and expansion

extractions.description: This document is a correction notice for the originally published paper. It addresses errors related to a URL in reference 61 and acknowledges contributions from specific neuroscience programs.

type.justification: The paper is a correction notice for a previous theoretical study about neural representations in recurrent neural networks.
type.quote: The Acknowledgements did not clearly thank both the Swartz Program in Theoretical Neuroscience at Harvard and the Swartz Center for Theoretical Neuroscience at the University of Washington.

name.justification: The research is primarily concerned with neural representations in recurrent neural networks, a topic within theoretical neuroscience.
name.quote: The Acknowledgements did not clearly thank both the Swartz Program in Theoretical Neuroscience at Harvard and the Swartz Center for Theoretical Neuroscience at the University of Washington.

name.justification: The original paper deals with robust representations in recurrent neural networks.
name.quote: Gradient-based learning drives robust representations in recurrent neural networks
